info.name: sample_videos
info.description: A module for sampling frames from videos

parameters.name: accel
parameters.description: A desired acceleration factor to apply when sampling frames. For example, an acceleration of 2x would correspond to sampling every other frame. If specified, this takes precedence over fps

parameters.name: fps
parameters.description: A desired sampling rate, which must be less than the frame rate of the input video

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: A desired output (width, height) of the sampled frames. Dimensions can be -1, in which case the input aspect ratio is preserved

parameters.name: max_fps
parameters.description: The maximum sampling rate allowed for the output video. If this parameter is specified, the accel and fps parameters will be adjusted as necessary to satisfy this constraint

parameters.name: max_size
parameters.description: A maximum (width, height) allowed for the sampled frames. Frames are resized as necessary to meet this limit, and size is decreased (aspect-preserving) if necessary to satisfy this constraint. Dimensions can be -1, in which case no limit is applied to them

parameters.name: always_sample_last
parameters.description: Whether to always sample the last frame of the video

parameters.name: max_video_file_size
parameters.description: The maximum file size of the input video in bytes. If size is greater than this, an error will be thrown

parameters.name: max_video_duration
parameters.description: The maximum duration of the input video in seconds. If duration is greater than this, an error will be thrown
